instructions:
In a large bowl combine and mix well all ingredients except the potatoes, cheese and paprika. Fold in
potatoes and mix until coated. Turn into a buttered 9 x 13 inch baking dish and sprinkle with grated cheese
and paprika. Bake in a 350 F oven for about 1 hour and 20 minutes or until browned and bubbly. Serves 12.
*(For half the recipe, use a 6 x 10 inch baking dish and bake for about 50 minutes.)*
ingredients: 1 pkg (26 oz) frozen shredded (country style) hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 can (10 oz) cream of potato soup
1 can (10 oz) cream of celery soup
name: Cheese Topped Hash Browns
